channel.title: Max Verstappen on TechnoStreet
channel.description: Recent content in Max Verstappen on TechnoStreet

item.title: “For me, that’s not really a race”: Max Verstappen doesn’t get point behind having more sprint races
item.description: “For me, that’s not really a race”: Max Verstappen doesn’t get point behind having more sprint races In 2021, F1 introduced sprint races to Formula 1 weekend and saw it had significant success.

item.title: “Constant digging is disrespectful” – Max Verstappen hits out at reporter Ted Kravitz as he continues to snub Sky Sports F1
item.description: “Constant digging is disrespectful” – Max Verstappen hits out at reporter Ted Kravitz as he continues to snub Sky Sports F1 Red Bull F1 team and Max Verstappen decided to boycott the UK, German and Italian affiliates of the British media house Sky Sports during the Mexican GP weekend.
